alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Murray, southern Whitfield, southeastern Walker and Gordon Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Villanow to near Lake Marvin to near Redbud, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Resaca, Fairmount, Ranger, Sonoraville, Redbud, Tilton, Audubon, Mill Creek, Villanow, Sugar Valley, Oakman, Nickelsville and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
